intro: Moraea fergusoniae, commonly known as the Orange River Moraea, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Iridaceae family and is characterized by its striking orange-red flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun. It is often found in the Western and Northern Cape provinces. Moraea fergusoniae is a perennial herb that produces showy blooms during the summer months.
